title: Win/Mac版：AE插件：摄像机反求跟踪插件 FayTeq FayIN v2.1.3.1+使用教程
author: 大众脸
content: FayTeq FayIN 是一款专为 Adobe After Effects 设计的高效摄像机反求跟踪插件，支持在视频中自动插入 2D 数字内容，并精确计算场景中的光影效果。该插件具备平面与 2D/3D 跟踪功能，可智能识别最佳跟踪参数，无需手动关键帧设置。支持多素材插入、缩放、旋转和透视调整，且可重复更换插入内容而保持原有跟踪结果。适用于需要快速实现虚拟元素合成的专业用户。
supported_os: Windows 7 (或更高), Mac OSX 10.10 (或更高)

download_links.name: Mac OSX 苹果版本下载

other.plugin_description_en: fayIN is highly efficient camera tracking and full automated insertion of digital contents for Adobe® After Effects®. The plugin facilitates object tracking and insertion of digital content. Save valuable time and increase your sales potential. Thanks to automation of the tracking process, fayIN works extraordinarily fast and delivers results of best quality. As plugin for Adobe®After Effects® fayIN assimilates perfectly into the existing work flow. No changing between different software environments is necessary.
features: innovative planar and 2D / 3D tracker for object and camera tracking
intuitive selection of the tracking area with a rectangle or mask tool
full automatic detection of the best setting for camera data and profile or track position
track report with hints to optimize the track
corner correction for a perfect adjustment of the plane
intuitive adjustment of scale, rotation and perspective
easy exchange of the insert: tracking results still performing
related_plugins: AE三维摄相机跟踪插件 The Foundry Camera Tracker 1.0v9（win/Mac）
